foxml:datastreamVersion.LABEL: Dublin Core Record for this object

element.label: Ingest File
element.name: ingest-file-location
element.description: Please select an image to ingest. This image will be used as the first image of the building shown to the user. It will also be used as the thumbnail for the building.

element.label: Site Name
element.name: mods_title
element.description: A descriptive title of the building.

element.label: Medium
element.name: mods_format
element.description: Choose the format of the original item that was digitized.

element.label: Freeform Copyright Declaration
element.name: mods_rights
element.description: You may choose to provide additional notes to the license above, or in the case where you would not like to use Creative Commons, then you must provide a copyright notice here.

element.label: Note
element.name: mods_note
element.description: Add a note about the digital object.
